mapper.select: select * from user_tb where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into user_tb (username, password, email, created_at) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, now())
mapper.update: update user_tb set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, tel = #{tel}, profile = #{profile}, career = #{career} where id = #{id}
